description: connect GET requests to attach of Pod

parameters.description: The container in which to execute the command. Defaults to only container if there is only one container in the pod.
parameters.name: container

parameters.description: Stderr if true indicates that stderr is to be redirected for the attach call. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: stderr

parameters.description: Stdin if true, redirects the standard input stream of the pod for this call. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: stdin

parameters.description: Stdout if true indicates that stdout is to be redirected for the attach call. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: stdout

parameters.description: TTY if true indicates that a tty will be allocated for the attach call. This is passed through the container runtime so the tty is allocated on the worker node by the container runtime. Defaults to false.
parameters.name: tty
